reviews.text: Basic sports facility. Lacks some essential machines at the gym although it’s been renovated recently. Pool could use some very serious cleaning and opening times are quite limited. Staff is very friendly and the price is quite affordable specially for central london.

My swimming booking was canceled 10 minutrs before the starting. It was 8am in the morning, and I had to turn back home.
Terrible service.
No time table for swimming phone number just goes to a robot no help no useful imformation took me 20 minutes to log onto the website just for it to not let me book anything worst website

Been taking my two kids here for swimming lessons for over 5 months now, weekly lessons, twice a month you’re guaranteed their lessons will get cancelled on the day- no prior notice, just under an hour before they’re due to begin in most cases.
The swimming lessons aren’t managed very well at all! None of the children in that class have moved up a stage, no updates from swimming instructors on when either, when lessons got cancelled they used to issue refunds without any issues until Rhonda started managing and it all fell apart. Weeks and weeks go by without any refunds, no reply to emails, no reply to phone calls, given the runaround by staff who all have a different spin on things when you finally get through! If you go in there’s apparently no managers available, does this Rhonda even exist?! We get told she’s the only one that can issue refunds yet she never seems to be in, never replies to emails calls etc… Absolute shambles. Completely mismanaged. Other parents whose children attend swim lessons seem to be having the exact same issues too, and the funny thing is, they admit to other people having the same problems yet do absolutely nothing to solve them! 3 weeks and counting and still getting absolutely nowhere. Any other business triggers refunds automatically without people having to nag them to death! Cancel your memberships and move elsewhere like i’ve done, save yourselves the hassle of dealing with non existent managers, and swim lessons that don’t seem to advance. Contact your bank for assistance they were great in dealing with them directly.

We went for the swimming pool and we were very disappointed. The pool was utterly disgusting and it had clearly not been cleaned before hand. There were also dead flies in there. There was no AC in the pool so it was extremely hot and the pool itself was reletively small.
On the other hand, the changing rooms were very dirty, the lockers didn't close properly so someone could have easily stolen our belongings. The showers were rusty and the floor was atrocious. Let alone the very expensive membership prices. If you are looking for a gym local it's not bad but for anything else it's not worth it. We spoke to the manager and luckily he had given us compensation to swim at a local pool.

address: Fann St, Fane Lane, Golden Lane Estate, London EC1Y 0SH, United Kingdom
